footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Synergy: Kinich | Update Date: 05/10/2025 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Due to Kinich's excessive movement, Bennett may be less than ideal to play since his burst circle is very small. This is an issue that makes Iansan prefered. However, Kinich may struggle to maintain uptime on the __Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City__ set's buffs.

Since both Kinich and Emilie tend to run offensive sets, you can run __Deepwood Memories__ on someone like Thoma or Dehya for the resistance shredding.
